title: Boomer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Defend your Property up to 3 times per game, shooting anyone who visits you and then shooting a player of your choice.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are roleblocked every night by your wife. You expend charges even if you are roleblocked.
- If you are visited by another player, you are not roleblocked by your wife tonight.
- If you are roleblocked 3 times, you get a divorce, and lose your house, so you can't Defend your Property anymore.

desc:
Post 3539
*WiFi? I already have a 'wife-I' hate!*
